titles.title: To authorize the District of Columbia to enter into multi-year agreements to carry out certain public-private partnership projects and make payments for the termination costs under such agreements in any fiscal year, and for other purposes.
District of Columbia Public-Private Partnerships Home Rule Act
District of Columbia Public-Private Partnerships Home Rule Act
District of Columbia Public-Private Partnerships Home Rule Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
